name: Great Suwa War Retold
description:
The strongest native god versus the most relentless god of wind and rain, 2000 years later. Will Moriya's divine iron rings beat out holy storms? Probably, because it's impossible to run out of lives in this danmaku game.

Made in 72 hours for Touhou Jam 5, and mostly while working with https://anumania.itch.io/.
